        @NonNull
public static java.lang.String streamToString(@NonNull
                                                        java.io.InputStream input,
                                                        int limit)
                                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Reads an InputStream into a string
        Parameters:
        input - InputStream to read.
        limit - the maximum number of lines to read (the last x lines are kept)
        Returns:
        the String that was read.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the InputStream could not be read.

      • streamToString

        @NonNull
public static java.lang.String streamToString(@NonNull
                                                        java.io.InputStream input,
                                                        com.android.internal.util.Predicate<java.lang.String> filter,
                                                        int limit)
                                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Reads an InputStream into a string
        Parameters:
        input - InputStream to read.
        filter - Predicate that should return false for lines which should be excluded.
        limit - the maximum number of lines to read (the last x lines are kept)
        Returns:
        the String that was read.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the InputStream could not be read.

      • streamToStringNonBlockingRead

        @NonNull
public static java.lang.String streamToStringNonBlockingRead(@NonNull
                                                                       java.io.InputStream input,
                                                                       com.android.internal.util.Predicate<java.lang.String> filter,
                                                                       int limit)
                                                                throws java.io.IOException
        Reads an InputStream into a string without blocking the current thread. It has a default timeout of 3 seconds.
        Parameters:
        input - InputStream to read.
        filter - Predicate that should return false for lines which should be excluded.
        limit - the maximum number of lines to read (the last x lines are kept).
        Returns:
        the String that was read.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the InputStream could not be read.
